name: Screen Corner Debug
author: Bagu
info:
Tired of always have to set screen corner barriers, to avoid scrolling crashes?
This (very simple) function will always check if you come too close, to the edges,
in each screen corner and fixes any buggy behavior.
description:
It check Link's (pxl) position on the screen, and kill all relevant button inputs,
if you are to far up&left, up&right, down&left or down&right.

For example:
if Link's X-Position AND Link's Y-Position is below "4"
...you won't be abled to go any further left or up
...you can just move right or down (AWAY FROM THE CORNER!)

...dont forget to leave a rating
setup: ...not much to say...Put the function declaration anywhere in your script or imported/included headerand place "ScreenCornerDebug();" in the "while(true)" loop of your active global- or hero script.
